notes: US base Impreza early years; simple ECU
Common NA swap base; phase varies by year/market
Late years can be DBW; some trims immobilizer
Best swap ECU era (no immobilizer, cable)
Gold-standard JDM motor: AVCS, high rev, no immobilizer
Final drive varies by model; match rear diff
Classic WRX 5MT; reliability risk at high power
Unique 3.70 FD; must match rear diff
Requires R180 3.90 and STI driveline parts; pull-type clutch
Requires STI axles/hubs or hybrid conversion

message: DBW engine needs pedal + wiring + ECU support.
Requires STI crossmember, driveshaft, shifter, pull-type clutch/flywheel, starter; hubs/axles or hybrids; DCCD controller recommended.
5MT reliability risk at power; consider STI 6MT.
